content.rendered:
Shopify #1 proposed GDPR | CCPA | LGPD, Cookie Consent, EU Cookie Banner & Customer Privacy app
The most powerful & flexible solution for Cookie Consent and Store Scanning for GDPR compliance. Flexible Multilingual cookie bars/banners. Integration with Shopify Customer Privacy, Google Consent Mode, Facebook Pixel, Rakuten, etc about privacy policy consent. The app elegantly informs visitors that your store uses cookies based on your policy and gives them the option to consent and even select their preferences. Then it gives your customers a page to manage their consent and their data rights (Data Subject Requests) as well as a cookie declaration page. It prevails over other external services because it is designed for Shopify needs and with Shopify requirements. A must-have app for data privacy, data policy, and privacy policy consent over GDPR.

Benefits

  • Cookie consent banner
  • Data subject requests management
  • Cookie declaration

Promotion offer

15% discount forever

Condition of participation

Users first time install GDPR Compliance Center via BullTheme’s referral link
App Details
Get promotion
